reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed there for two nights and enjoyed it, they were kind enough to let us book in early with no extra charge.
reviews.title: Very nice hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed 8 nights in late Jan/early Feb. The staff was excellent -- went out of their way to be helpful. The room was more than adequate, plenty of space and quiet (we were on the 8th floor). Would be nice if they invested in some new towels -- a bit worn and not overly white, but serviceable. Missed having an English-language news channel on TV. The breakfast buffet
reviews.title: Good stay on Buenos Aires

reviews.text: was OK but got a bit repetitive. The location was fine -- easy access to subway, easy to get a taxi, and well within walking distance of many attractions and nice restaurants. For those looking for fine coffee, don't miss the Black Cat (Gato Negro) three blocks away on Av Corrientes.
reviews.title: Go away

reviews.text: Well, the hotel doesn't very bad, the problem was that we choice the truth Amerian Buenos Aires Park Hotel.The hotel menager put the guests on the other Amerian when the main Amerian is unavailable.The worst is that we only knew this fact one day to departure.So, when select hte Amerian Buenos Aires be sure that your reservation was done right . Ah, the another Amerian, the Amerian Congreso, the localization is very good, but just it.Room small, without kitchen at the hotel(if you need a simple sandwish, go to the corner and buy it).
reviews.title: For hardcore smokers only

reviews.text: This hotel came with a package tour and it has a good location, but the hotel rooms are old and the smell of old smoke permiated the carpet, bedding, etc. It was not dirty as in bugs or anything, but the old smoke smell made me feel dirty all day and night.
reviews.title: OK Hotel but out of the way.
